name: Farn
description:
Farn is a game about farning. Pick your seeds, plant them, build machines to plant them for you, make lots of fake money that you can't do anything with. Enjoy!


Made solo by Jordan Brown in less than 48 Hours using:
GameMaker Studio - Most things
Paint.net - A few art assets
FL Studio - Music
bfxr - Sound effects

A buggy, ugly version is playable in browser here: https://popcorn897.itch.io/farn-hmtl5 I would personally recommend downloading it, but if you are lazy, this one plays pretty much the same
